scripts.dev: rm -rf src/generated && tsup --watch --ignore-watch src/generated src --onSuccess node dist/buildClient.js
scripts.build: pnpm build-routes && pnpm build-client && pnpm swc src --out-dir dist --source-maps true src
scripts.build-tsup: pnpm build-routes && rm -rf src/generated && tsup src && node dist/buildClient.js && tsup src
scripts.build-client: rm -rf src/generated && pnpm swc src --out-dir dist --source-maps true src && node dist/buildClient.js
